ygData.subject: Re: level hell
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm well I know for a fact at least for me that 25 was no diffrent from any other hell level. Of course on my other char I started killing treeants from 21-30.
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm well I know for a fact at least for me that 25 was no diffrent from any
other hell level. Of course on my other char I started killing treeants from
21-30. Through all those levels but level 30 I gained exp the same amount.
Usually a level a day if I put in a good amount of time. However 30 did take
3 days at the treeants so it was quite obvious 30 was a hell level.

Believe me it doesn't get any better currently my other char ( a necro ) hit
35 about 3 weeks ago. For some reason I chose that level to die over and
over. Everytime I got within two bubbles of leveling I would go and die two
times in a row. In fact overall I probably died at least 12 times :(.
Luckily I usually got a res. Still it's a pain to get through but the
satisfaction is good when you finish the level.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: CYR, Thierry <tcyr@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, September 07, 1999 9:41 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] level hell


>From: "CYR, Thierry" <tcyr@...>
>
>If it makes you feel any better i've died 3 times in lev 30 and have been
in
>it for over 3 weeks now, going on my 4th week. Its so depressing, this
whole
>level i've made enough money to buy full steel plate by killing giants,
even
>got a box of aku-bar. While i had almost caught up to most of my group
when
>i hit 30, they've all jumped ahead and are now all 37-40. If im lucky i
>might level tonight or tomorrow and get out of my first hell level. I even
>made a few low lev chars to change my train of thoughts to get away from
the
>depressing feeling of 30.
>
>Minkin Nehoc
>Forever 30
>Solusek Ro
>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Abraham Hardjana [SMTP:ahardjan@...]
>> Sent: September 3, 1999 12:05 PM
>> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
>> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Superstitions?
>>
>> From: Abraham Hardjana <ahardjan@...>
>>
>>
>>
>> On Fri, 3 Sep 1999 kim@... wrote:
>>
>> > From: <kim@...>
>> >
>> > 25 is a mini-hell. Most people don't notice it, but I'd
>> > estimate it took me about 70% longer to get through it.
>>
>>
>>
>> Ack say it isn't so =(. I dinna want it to be so. THough I think it is
>> noticable in Unrest since the mobs are mostly blue to me now. Perhaps 25
>> is one of those inbetween levels where most things are green or even =(.
>> Time to check Mistmoore then.
>>
>> > At 31 you lose about a bubble per death (vs. about 1/4-1/3 at
>> > 30 and 32). If you tend to have a high number of deaths per
>> > level as I know many of you do, this can really screw you up.
>> > Whereas before you were taking 5 steps forward and 2 steps
>> > back for a net gain of 3 steps a night, at 31 this can turn
>> > into 5 steps forward and 6 steps back for a net loss of 1 step
>> > a night, even though you are gaining experience and dying at
>> > the exact same rate as before. I hear this holds true for all
>> > hell-levels + 1.
>>
>> Ack, now I am getting depressed my friend. I was so happy to have
cleared
>> leel 24 with only one death. As my friends know well I am way to big on
>> the honour and chivalry bit and hence forth I die way too often
>> helping/saving friends. Oh well I guess I will be one of those bards
who
>> will congratulated 20-30 times for getting my level 30 =). Anyone know a
>> pretty cleric who would be willing to marry a bard who is proone to dying
>> and causing trains? ... ANy takers?... I guess not =)
>>
>> Treilanin Loreweaver
>> Honour Guard, Karana
>>
>>
